patch 8.0.1008: slow updating of terminal window in Motif

Problem:    Slow updating of terminal window in Motif.
Solution:   Add a timeout to the wait-for-character loop.

patch 8.0.1008: slow updating of terminal window in Motif

Problem:    Slow updating of terminal window in Motif.
Solution:   Add a timeout to the wait-for-character loop.
